# Clean [Inkar Datasets](https://www.inkar.de/)

This project contains code to cleanup inkar datasets.

Inkar datasets come in an untidy format, you can check them [here](https://www.inkar.de/WizardStart).

Here is an example dataset: [./data/latest/Economy/Economy-performance/Wirtschaftliche-Leistung.csv](./data/latest/Economy/Economy-performance/Wirtschaftliche-Leistung.csv)

```{r}
#| message: false
source('clean-and-separate.R')
# example file
path = "data/latest/Economy/Economy-performance/Wirtschaftliche-Leistung.csv"
df = read_in(path)
tidy_df = make_tidy_data(df)
```

## Before

```{r}
df
```
## After


```{r}
tidy_df
```
